chunk_text: I extracted the camera rotation matrix from the quaternion, then used a simple pinhole projection. I wanted to see the object in the real image view. 2.1.1 Why It Failed  My point cloud was not dense enough, so the reprojected images looked incomplete.  The alignment with the actual photo was not correct in 2D space.  The method required a perfect 3D reconstruction to overlay the object in the final 2D images.
